definition: having the property of softening or fusing when heated and of hardening and becoming rigid again when cooled, a material that softens when heated and hardens again when cooled
details:
adjective
- having the property of softening or fusing when heated and of hardening and becoming rigid again when cooled
= example: having the property of softening or fusing when heated and of hardening and becoming rigid again when cooled
noun
- a material that softens when heated and hardens again when cooled
= synonyms: thermoplastic resin
